item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: We are working with ecologists to regularly assess the wildlife in the moat and monitor how it is changing ğŸ¦‹Â Our principal ambition is to create a haven for pollinators and Superbloom is just the beginning of that journey! ğŸ

item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: Last night I captured one of my best images to date. Probably the single most important event in a Guillemot's life. Unable to yet fly, a 3-week-old chick leaps off the cliff, following its dad who will teach it how to fend for itself out at sea over the coming weeks.
item.dc:creator: @Naturalist_Sam
item.description: Last night I captured one of my best images to date. Probably the single most important event in a Guillemot's life. Unable to yet fly, a 3-week-old chick leaps off the cliff, following its dad who will teach it how to fend for itself out at sea over the coming weeks.

item.title: R to @ErlandCooper: He wrote some of his most celebrated music in a tiny bothy on the island Hoy, off clock time, a daily rhythm of wild time, shaped by weather & friendship.
item.dc:creator: @ErlandCooper
item.description: He wrote some of his most celebrated music in a tiny bothy on the island Hoy, off clock time, a daily rhythm of wild time, shaped by weather & friendship.

item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: Super excited to have booked tickets for a gig possibly a silent one, in 2024, to hear @ErlandCooper perform Carve the runes then be content with silence, as it sounds from the ground. Hopefully a couple more trips to Orkney before then to continue my fascination with these isles
item.dc:creator: @AndyHarrod79
